reasoning_log: The dataset provided 10 descriptions and 10 images, resulting in a perfect 1:1 mapping with no redundant images. The matching was primarily based on identifying unique architectural features and room types: Images 1-4 depict the various angles of the high-ceiling living room and mezzanine structure (Desc_1, Desc_2, Desc_3, Desc_4). Images 5 and 9 were distinguished by the presence (Desc_5/Image_5) or absence (Desc_9/Image_9) of the toilet in the frame. Images 6 and 7 were confirmed as the upper-level dining/kitchen (Desc_6) and the ground-level main kitchen adjacent to the stairs (Desc_7), respectively, identifiable by the dark green cabinets and layout. Image 8 was uniquely identified by the extensive wooden built-in storage (Desc_8), and Image 10 was clearly the indoor parking garage (Desc_10) due to the rolling doors and floor stains.

matching_result_list.evidence: Shows the high ceiling (挑高空間), internal stairs, and the built-in dark TV cabinet (內建電視矮櫃) against the wood-paneled wall.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 挑高空間(樓中樓設計提升空間感), 規則格局(長方形客廳好規劃家具), 採光中等(前後端有開口但中段略暗), 基本裝潢(地板與天花板完成可直接入住), 壁面預留插座(多組電源方便家電佈局), 內梯動線明確(樓梯集中一側利分層使用), 內建電視矮櫃(提供收納與擺放電視位置), 牆面淺色(增加明亮感與放大效果)

matching_result_list.evidence: A wide-angle view of the open space, showing the speckled quartz tile floor (地坪耐磨石英磚) and the general layout from a different perspective than Image 1.
